issues.title: Research Logseq Plugin API and Architecture
issues.body_preview: Understand Logseq plugin system architecture, APIs, and best practices for DB plugins.

issues.title: Design Plugin API for Ontology Import/Sync
issues.body_preview: Design the public API and internal architecture for ontology import and synchronization.

issues.title: Analyze EDN Parser Requirements
issues.body_preview: Determine requirements and approach for parsing EDN template files in the plugin.

issues.title: Create Technical Specification Document
issues.body_preview: Consolidate all research and design work into a comprehensive technical specification.

issues.title: Set Up Plugin Project Scaffolding
issues.body_preview: Create the initial plugin project structure with build tools and development environment.

issues.title: Implement EDN Parser Module
issues.body_preview: Build a robust EDN parser that can handle Logseq ontology template files.

issues.title: Create Logseq API Wrapper Module
issues.body_preview: Build an abstraction layer for interacting with Logseq's database APIs.

issues.title: Implement Basic Import Functionality
issues.body_preview: Create the core import functionality to load templates into Logseq.

issues.title: Implement Template Source Management
issues.body_preview: Allow users to configure and manage multiple template sources.

issues.title: Implement Sync Functionality
issues.body_preview: Enable automatic synchronization with template sources to keep ontologies up-to-date.

issues.title: Implement Conflict Resolution System
issues.body_preview: Handle conflicts between template source and local modifications intelligently.

issues.title: Add Version Control and History
issues.body_preview: Track changes to ontology over time and enable rollback capabilities.

issues.title: UI/UX Polish and Accessibility
issues.body_preview: Refine user interface and ensure excellent user experience and accessibility.

issues.title: Comprehensive Testing Suite
issues.body_preview: Ensure plugin reliability through comprehensive testing.

issues.title: Complete Documentation
issues.body_preview: Provide comprehensive documentation for users and contributors.

issues.title: Performance Optimization
issues.body_preview: Optimize plugin performance for large templates and smooth user experience.

issues.title: Prepare for Marketplace Release
issues.body_preview: Prepare plugin for publication to Logseq marketplace.
